titleStmt.title: All the vvorkes of Iohn Taylor the water-poet Beeing sixty and three in number. Collected into one volume by the author: vvith sundry new additions corrected, reuised, and newly imprinted, 1630.
Works
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.
Cockson, Thomas, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] B[eale, Elizabeth Allde, Bernard Alsop, and Thomas Fawcet] for Iames Boler; at the signe of the Marigold in Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page, engraved, signed: T. Cockson sculp.
Beale printed quires A, 2A-2S, and ¹3A-3K; Allde printed B-O; Alsop and Fawcet printed ² 3A-3M (STC).
"Sir Gregory Nonsence his nevves from no place" (caption title) begins new pagination on 2A2r; "The vvater cormorant" (caption title) begins new pagination on 3A1r.

place.placeName: the signe of the Marigold in Pauls Churchyard
